entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:29 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:45 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 07:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm except 15 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 this morning then light near noon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
